arn.description: The ARN of the topic rule destination

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable the destination. Default: `true`.

vpcConfiguration.description: Configuration of the virtual private cloud (VPC) connection. For more info, see the [AWS documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/iot/latest/developerguide/vpc-rule-action.html).
